languages.text: {n}Люди постоянно движутся, приходят и уходят, меняются местами или просто исчезают из виду. В первый раз вам удалось сосчитать двести тридцать восемь просителей, во второй — двести сорок четыре. На третий в зал запустили очередную партию несчастных, и счет сбился.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из-за того, люди постоянно движутся, приходят и уходят, меняются метсами или просто исчезают из виду, вам удалось в первый раз сосчитать двести тридцать восемь просителей, во второй — двести сорок четыре. На третий в зал запустили очередную партию просителей, и счет сбился.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди постоянно движутся, приходят и уходят, меняются местами или просто исчезают из виду. В первый раз вам удалось сосчитать двести тридцать восемь просителей, во второй — двести сорок четыре. На третий в зал запустили очередную партию несчастных, и счет сбился.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

{n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人们不断地移动着，来来去去。有些人换了地方，还有些人直接从你的视野中消失了。在你第一次尝试数的时候，你数到了238个人，第二次的时候，你数到了244个人。而当你第三次尝试的时候，一批不幸的请愿者被送进了大厅，于是你忘记自己数到多少了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人们不断地移动着，来来去去。有些人换了地方，还有些人直接从你的视野中消失了。在你第一次尝试数的时候，你数到了238个人，第二次的时候，你数到了244个人。而当你第三次尝试的时候，一批不幸的请愿者被送进了大厅，于是你忘记自己数到多少了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La gente está en un estado constante de idas y venidas, cambios de lugar y desapareciendo de tu campo de visión. En tu primer intento, cuentas doscientos treinta y ocho solicitantes. En el segundo, doscientos cuarenta y cuatro. En el tercero, entra el siguiente grupo de desdichados a la sala y pierdes la cuenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente está en un estado constante de idas y venidas, cambios de lugar y desapareciendo de tu campo de visión. En tu primer intento, cuentas doscientos treinta y ocho solicitantes. En el segundo, doscientos cuarenta y cuatro. En el tercero, entra el siguiente grupo de desdichados a la sala y pierdes la cuenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}絶えず人が動いては行ったり来たり、場所を変えたり、視界から消えたりしている。1度目は238人の嘆願者。2度目は244人だ。3回目は、不幸を背負った次の一団がホールに案内されて入ってきたために数え損なってしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}絶えず人が動いては行ったり来たり、場所を変えたり、視界から消えたりしている。1度目は238人の嘆願者。2度目は244人だ。3回目は、不幸を背負った次の一団がホールに案内されて入ってきたために数え損なってしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gens vont et viennent en permanence, changeant de place ou bien disparaissant simplement de votre champ de vision. À la première tentative, vous comptez un total de deux cent trente-huit requérants. À la deuxième, le décompte passe à deux cent quarante-quatre. À la troisième, un énième groupe de malheureux est introduit dans la salle et vous perdez le compte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gens vont et viennent en permanence, changeant de place ou bien disparaissant simplement de votre champ de vision. À la première tentative, vous comptez un total de deux cent trente-huit requérants. À la deuxième, le décompte passe à deux cent quarante-quatre. À la troisième, un énième groupe de malheureux est introduit dans la salle et vous perdez le compte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menschen sind ständig in Bewegung, sie kommen und gehen, tauschen Plätze oder verschwinden einfach aus dem Blickfeld. Bei deinem ersten Versuch zählst du zweihundertachtunddreißig Antragsteller. Bei deinem zweiten Versuch sind es zweihundertvierundvierzig. Bei deinem dritten Versuch werden neue unglückliche Seelen in die Halle geführt, und du verlierst den Überblick.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menschen sind ständig in Bewegung, sie kommen und gehen, tauschen Plätze oder verschwinden einfach aus dem Blickfeld. Bei deinem ersten Versuch zählst du zweihundertachtunddreißig Antragsteller. Bei deinem zweiten Versuch sind es zweihundertvierundvierzig. Bei deinem dritten Versuch werden neue unglückliche Seelen in die Halle geführt, und du verlierst den Überblick.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnsanlar durmadan hareket ediyor, gelip gidiyor, yer değiştiriyor veya gözden kayboluveriyor. İlk denemende iki yüz otuz sekiz müracaatçı sayıyorsun. İkinci denemende iki yüz kırk dört kişi sayıyorsun. Üçüncü denemendeyse salona talihsiz bir grup insan daha alındığı için hesabını şaşırıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people are constantly moving, coming and going, changing places or simply disappearing from view. On your first attempt, you count two hundred and thirty-eight petitioners. On your second attempt, you count two hundred and forty-four. On your third attempt, the next batch of unlucky souls is ushered into the hall, and you lose count.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnsanlar durmadan hareket ediyor, gelip gidiyor, yer değiştiriyor veya gözden kayboluveriyor. İlk denemende iki yüz otuz sekiz müracaatçı sayıyorsun. İkinci denemende iki yüz kırk dört kişi sayıyorsun. Üçüncü denemendeyse salona talihsiz bir grup insan daha alındığı için hesabını şaşırıyorsun.{/n}
